definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: I'm like a junkie wanting a proper fix these days.
sentences.chinese: 我这些天就像个瘾君子一样等着给我来支强心剂。

sentences.english: He has been labelled a " druggie".
sentences.chinese: 他被贴上“瘾君子”的卷标了。

sentences.english: Soon, before a pothead dies at booth.
sentences.chinese: 不久之后，一名瘾君子死于电话亭前。

sentences.english: The police are always urged to crack down on drug addicts.
sentences.chinese: 人们总是敦促警察好好治治吸毒瘾君子。

sentences.english: Dr. Townsend was a drug addict.
sentences.chinese: 汤森特医生是个嗜药成癖的瘾君子。

sentences.english: I understand why you stole, because you're a junky .
sentences.chinese: 我明白你为什么要偷，因为你是个瘾君子。

sentences.english: For two years, hedocumented the addicts he encountered in a single, half-mile radius ofthe city.
sentences.chinese: 两年来，他记录了城中仅半英里半径内遇到的瘾君子。

sentences.english: We use “bad habits” the way drug users use drugs.
sentences.chinese: 我们对待坏习惯就好似瘾君子对待毒品。

sentences.english: The addict prowled about for a place to drug up.
sentences.chinese: 瘾君子到处潜行找个地方吸毒。

sentences.english: Police data show that Germann is a notorious record of drug addicts and the unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 警方数据显示，格尔曼是个无业和劣迹斑斑的瘾君子。

sentences.english: Her son is an unbeliever and a drug addict. In Yekaterina's own words: "He doesn't value his life."
sentences.chinese: 她在五年前成为基督徒，她的儿子是一个瘾君子。

sentences.english: The majority of Sagittarians are drunks or pot-heads.
sentences.chinese: 大多数射手都是酒鬼或者瘾君子。

sentences.english: It's the day every junkie dreads.
sentences.chinese: 所有的瘾君子都害怕这一天的到来。

sentences.english: The same can be said of an adult smoker or alcoholic.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的例子就是成年人中的瘾君子和酒鬼。

sentences.english: You are turning a firstclass zonker.
sentences.chinese: 你正在变成一号瘾君子啦。

definition: to resume smoking (after giving up)/to relapse into smoking or drug abuse
